subject: New Member
author: noni104
full_text:
Hello all! I joined recently but had not posted yet.  I have a deep interest in EVP's and communication from our other-side.  Don't have any prominent abilities - just a strong belief.

The reason I am posting right now is I was just on a site that was discussing the Ovilus (itcbridge.com)and someone named MICK mentioned this site and another person named REGAN responded.  Felt it was a good time to say hello!
